subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{zh-ref|Unger (1986)}} reconstructs Old Chinese pronunciation as *'''pl(j)aŋʔ''' and considers this item part of a word family under {{och-l|陽}} and related to {{cog|th|tr=plaŋ|t=bright}}; alternatively, {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} minimally reconstructs *'''br(j)aŋʔ''' and includes [[炳]] in an {{der|zh|aav}} word family under {{och-l|亮}}. See there for more.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|功業彪炳|炳燭夜遊|炳曜|炳燭|炳炳鑿鑿|炳燭之明|文炳雕龍|戰功彪炳|炳炳烺烺|炳然|炳煥|炳如日星|炳若日星|炳賁|炳著|炳靈寺|炳蔚|炳炳麟麟|彪炳千古|彪炳|炳文}}
